verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-ADV: reportedly] [V: gave] [ARG2: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] [ARG1: his " direct " phone number] [ARGM-TMP: following their landmark meeting in Singapore] .
President Donald Trump reportedly gave North Korean leader Kim Jong Un his " direct " phone number [V: following] [ARG2: their landmark meeting in Singapore] .
